title: Projects,mass Bottles, 1915–20
medium: Pencil, white heightening, red watercolor, creamy paper
inscribed: Written at top right: [two overlapping letters V] V (vinum) on thumb piece; written with ink bottom left: My choice / AEM
description: The handles are at right. Leaves and a band with gems at the foot. A band with vine decoration and gems surrounds the shoulder. Leaves, diamonds on the cover.

tombstone.epitaph: Projects,mass Bottles, 1915–20.Pencil, white heightening, red watercolor, creamy paper. 1939-84-52-a.
